speaker: Narrator
text: Sarah finds you in the inn's small chapel, a quiet space away from the chaos.

speaker: Sarah
text: There you are. I was hoping to find you.

speaker: Sarah
text: Yes, I just... I wanted to thank you. For today. You took hits that were meant for me.

speaker: Sarah
text: Not always. I've run with people who would throw you to the THINGS if it meant saving themselves.

speaker: Sarah
text: You're different. You actually care about the people around you. That's... rare these days.

speaker: Sarah
text: Here. Let me teach you some recovery techniques. If you're going to keep taking hits for people, you should at least know how to survive them.

speaker: Narrator
text: [Friendship with Sarah increased! Max Health permanently +10]
